title: Discover the Top 10 Photovoltaic Trends in 2023 - StartUs Insights
summary: A new report from Innovation Map outlines the top 10 global photovoltaic (PV) trends for 2023. These trends include the use of high-performance PV materials, solar resource assessment, artificial intelligence (AI), robotics, solar-as-a-service, sustainable photovoltaics, and more. The report highlights 20 promising PV startups and their innovative solutions that improve asset maintenance, performance, and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE, the article discusses several green innovations, such as high-performance PV materials, sustainable photovoltaics, and solar-as-a-service, that contribute to environmental sustainability goals.

green_process: TRUE, the article mentions solar-as-a-service as a trend in the industry, which is defined in the context as a method or technique in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.
